question: Which among the following is correct regarding the alkaline battery ?
option1: Negative terminal made of Zinc Powder and Positive terminal made of Manganese dioxide & electrolyte is KOH
option2: Negative terminal made of Manganese dioxide and Positive terminal made of Zinc powder & electrolyte KOH
option3: Negative terminal made of Zinc Powder and Positive terminal made of Manganese dioxide & Electrolyte is Ammonium Chloride
option4: Negative terminal made of Manganese dioxide and Positive terminal made of Zinc powder & electrolyte Ammonium Chloride
answer: Negative terminal made of Zinc Powder and Positive terminal made of Manganese dioxide & electrolyte is KOH
